#DATA CLEANING

```{r}

# tidy data
tidy_data <- data %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate_all(~as.character(.)) %>% 
  pivot_longer(-parameter) %>%
  mutate(name = str_remove_all(name, "_[0-9].*")) %>% 
  mutate(year = rep(rep(1996:2022, each = 7), 25))%>% 
  pivot_wider(id_cols = c(year, parameter), names_from = name, values_from = value)

```
